page.title: 02PRINCIPAL ROADS IN OUR AREA
page.content: The A38 cuts through Bathpool and the A361 cuts through Monkton Heathfield. During the late 1950's,1960's & early 1970's when traffic was increasing,the 2 roads were very busy indeed. However in 1975 the completion of the motorway (M5) reduced the traffic on the A.38 greatly and to a lesser extent on the A.361 which is the main Minehead and Barnstaple road. The M5,which runs down into Devon and up to the Midlands and the M4,has en- abled both commercial and private in- terest in the area.For example,Langdon Industries,which is a haulage firm,are based at Walford Cross;and the current owner of Langaller House is a London insurance broker. He travels to London on Mondays and returns to Somerset for the weekend.His wife does not go with him to London because she prefers the tranquillity of Langaller.
